issue.title: [Packaging][RPM] Building RPMs for AlmaLinux 8 or later and CentOS Stream 8 are timed out
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16815](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16815). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
e.g.: https://app.travis-ci.com/github/ursacomputing/crossbow/builds/251836560

```

No output has been received in the last 10m0s, this potentially indicates a stalled build or something wrong with the build itself.
```

Generally, this is caused by too many parallel jobs that exhaust memory.

This is caused by ARROW-16745.
